patthana23.31:1.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.31:2.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana23.31:3.1: Naparittārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) … Ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare ekavīsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, natthiyā vigate ekavīsa.
